segments.text: May , do you mind helping me prepare for the picnic ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Have you checked the weather report ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . It says it will be sunny all day . No sign of rain at all.This is your father's favorite sausage . Sandwiches for you and Daniel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thanks Mom . I'd like some toast and chicken wings .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . Please take some fruit salad and crackers for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Done . Oh , don't forget to take napkins disposable plates , cups and picnic blanket .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All set . May , can you help me take all these things to the living room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ask Daniel to give you a hand ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , mom , I can manage it by myself . His help just causes more trouble .
segments.speaker: S2
